info.title: Redback's Action Factory
info.description: This is a class for attaching all kind of actions and listeners to elements to be handled in the client side and communicate with the server.

method.name: setModuleAction
method.description: Creates a module action listener to the given item. This listener invokes a module GET action to the specified module and view.

parameter.name: $item
parameter.description: The handler item to invoke the action.

parameter.name: $viewName
parameter.description: The module's view name. If it left empty, it gets the default module's view. Empty by default.

parameter.name: $holder
parameter.description: The holder container for the content that will be loaded. For more information, see \ESS\Protocol\server\ModuleProtocol.

parameter.name: $attr
parameter.description: A set of attributes to be passed to the module.

parameter.name: $loading
parameter.description: If true, set the page loading indicator. False by default.

method.name: setPopupAction

parameter.name: $item
parameter.description: The handler item to invoke the action.

parameter.name: $viewName
parameter.description: The module's view name. If it left empty, it gets the default module's view. Empty by default.

parameter.name: $attr
parameter.description: A set of attributes to be passed to the module.

method.deprecated: Merged with setModuleAction. The popup is invoked by the content loaded.

method.name: getReportRedirect
method.description: Creates a specific action report to invoke a page redirect to the client.

parameter.name: $domain
parameter.description: The subdomain of the location. If left empty, the full url will be considered the first parameter, otherwise the url will be resolved to this subdomain.

parameter.name: $formSubmit
parameter.description: Indicates whether the report will contain a submit action for forms and allow to unload the form.

method.name: getReportReload
method.description: Creates a specific action report to invoke a page reload to the client.

parameter.name: $formSubmit
parameter.description: Indicates whether the report will contain a submit action for forms and allow to unload the form.
